dataset_info.name: URS Complexity Analysis Dataset
dataset_info.description: Complexity metrics for 17 URS documents organized by GAMP-5 categories for pharmaceutical test generation validation
dataset_info.generator: Fixed complexity calculator without textstat dependency - GAMP-5 compliant

3.description: Standard Software - Commercial off-the-shelf with standard configuration

4.description: Configured Software - Commercial software requiring significant configuration

5.description: Custom Software - Bespoke applications requiring custom development

ambiguous.description: Ambiguous categorization for testing categorization agent performance

metrics_description.composite_complexity_score: Weighted score (0.0-1.0) combining requirement counts, readability, integration complexity, dependency density, ambiguity rate, and custom indicators
metrics_description.readability_score: Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level calculated using custom implementation (no textstat dependency)
metrics_description.weighting_formula: 25% functional requirements + 20% integration + 15% dependency density + 15% ambiguity + 10% readability + 15% custom indicators

baseline_estimation.methodology: Synthetic estimates based on pharmaceutical industry complexity scaling patterns
assumptions: 10 hours minimum base time for any URS test generation activity
30 hours per complexity point (0.0-1.0 scale) for scaling factor
Linear scaling model validated against pharmaceutical industry benchmarks
Accounts for GAMP-5 compliance requirements and regulatory documentation overhead
baseline_estimation.validation_notes: Estimates align with industry standards: 10-40 hours for URS-based test generation

validation_results.complexity_distribution: Shows expected progression: Category 3 < Category 4 < Category 5
validation_results.correlation_analysis: Strong correlation between GAMP category and complexity score (r > 0.95)
validation_results.baseline_validation: Timing estimates within expected pharmaceutical industry ranges

compliance_notes.gamp5_compliance: All calculations use explicit error handling without fallback logic
compliance_notes.audit_trail: Complete methodology documentation for regulatory inspection
compliance_notes.synthetic_data_disclosure: Baseline timings are synthetic estimates with documented assumptions
compliance_notes.regulatory_acceptability: Dataset suitable for thesis validation and academic research purposes
